desc: If you need to deduct money from this employee's paycheck (e.g. for Housing, Meals, or Transportation), you can choose either a one-time deduction or an ongoing deduction that occurs every pay period.
emptyListMessage: Once added, your deductions will appear here.

EditDeduction.desc: Amounts are withheld from the net pay of an employee and reported on the paystub and within payroll receipts. Note that these deductions are always post-tax and will start with the next pay period.

validations.amount: Amount must be a valid number
